tool_description: Leverage the power of Generative AI, Large Language Models (LLMs), and Machine Learning, along with specialized algorithms and comprehensive databases, to create a 'Similarity Key' for individual person names. This key enhances data accuracy by enabling intelligent matching of similar individual names, pinpointing data inconsistencies, boosting match rates, and identifying potential duplicate records.
name: Full Name Match
title: Full Name Match

api_list.name: Generate Full Name Similarity Key
api_list.description: Generates a similarity key for fuzzy matching with other full name records and data
